long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Welcome to the X-mask.

The X-mask has a gateway and wallet function to use XRUN's main net coin and NFT.
With a Chrome browser, you can use both your crypto assets and wallet functions.

This wallet has the following functions:

- Create your own wallet and load your already created XRunMainnet wallet
- Transfer of X-Run Mainnet Tokens
- Send Token to Exchange
- Confirmation of metaverse items and acquisition of tokens for purchase
- Personalization of Wallet

-------------------------------------
Information about the X-Run Mainnet can be obtained below.
https://www.xrun.run

Check the market price of an existing X-run in Digifinex.
https://www.digifinex.com/ko-kr/trade/BTC/XRUN

Check the market price of the existing X-run in CoinMarketCap CMC
https://coinmarketcap.com/currencies/xrun/

If you want to find X-runs in other services,
Twitter
https://twitter.com/FoundationXrun
Telegram
https://t.me/xrunmetaverseNFT

You can get information from the back.
